query.queryCore: DECLARE @StartInterval date = ? DECLARE @EndInterval date = ? DECLARE @tbl TABLE (iterday DATE); ;WITH seq(n) AS ( SELECT 0 UNION ALL SELECT n + 1 FROM seq WHERE n < DATEDIFF(DAY, @StartInterval, @EndInterval) ), d(d) AS ( SELECT DATEADD(DAY, n, @StartInterval) FROM seq ) INSERT INTO @tbl SELECT d OneDay FROM d ORDER BY d OPTION (MAXRECURSION 0); WITH r as ( SELECT [Reservation].[id] ,[Reservation].[bedId] ,CAST(reservationStart -0.5 AS date) startMinus12H ,CAST(reservationEnd - 0.5 AS date) endMinus12H FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[Reservation] WHERE [Reservation].[timeRetired] IS NULL AND [Reservation].[timeCreated] < GETDATE() AND [Reservation].[reservationStart] < @EndInterval ) SELECT r.[id] ,r.[bedId] ,YEAR(t.iterday) * 10000 + MONTH(t.iterday) * 100 + DAY(t.iterday) iterday FROM r INNER JOIN @tbl t ON iterday>= startMinus12H AND iterday <= endMinus12H INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Bed] ON r.[bedId] = [Bed].[id] INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] ON [Bed].[roomId] = [Room].[id] INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Facility] ON [Room].[facilityId] = [Facility].[id] WHERE 1=1
